snippet: Sycamore Partners has raised its bid for Talbots to $215 million, after circling the troubled women's clothing retailer for months.
abstract: Sycamore Partners has raised its bid for Talbots to $215 million, after circling the troubled women's clothing retailer for months.

headline.main: Sycamore Partners Increases Offer for Talbots to $215 Million
